amendment.description: Senate amendments insert a complete new text entitled "Hizballah International Financing Prevention Act of 2015" and appears on page H9341 of the Congressional Record of December 16, 2015.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in House Report 114-375 to ensure the bill preserves past and current surface and mineral rights for affected Indian tribes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 183 (Roll no. 684).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 183 (Roll no. 684).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cole.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
